text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia pocahontasae is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The length of the shell varies between 1.3 mm and 5.7 mm.
text.Distribution: This marine species occurs off Florida, USA,  Colombia and Argentina
